lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Crowley said the two areas of primary concern were the formation of corporations and the renting of farmland for cash by individuals, partnerships or joint ventures with a large number of participants.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The GAO said at least part of the recent proliferation of reorganizations was attributable to farmers' efforts to avoid payment limits, although exactly how many subdivisions were prompted by that concern were impossible to determine.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Subcommittee Chairman Dan Glickman, D-Kan., said evidence that a "few bad apples" were using imaginative techniques to skirt the payment limit jeopardized the "political credibility" of U.
